statements: SELECT id, sculpture_name, artist_name, location, loan_status FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, location FROM sculptures WHERE loan_status=true;
SELECT artist_name, location FROM sculptures ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, location FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name='Picasso';
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE location='Museum of Modern Art';

SELECT artists.name, artists.nationality, sculptures.name AS sculpture_name, sculptures.location FROM artists JOIN sculptures ON artists.name = sculptures.artist;
SELECT sculptures.name AS sculpture_name, locations.location_name, locations.address FROM sculptures JOIN locations ON sculptures.location = locations.location_name ORDER BY sculpture_name DESC;
